item.title: 美元在交投清淡中维持涨势，市场静候美联储会议纪要及美国GDP数据
item.description: 周二美元延续涨势，因市场正等待本周晚些时候可能出现的信号，以判断美联储降息的潜在时机。【原文：The dollar held gains on Tuesday as markets awaited signals, expected later this week, about the potential timing of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 亚洲市场谨慎开盘，油价因美伊谈判而上涨
item.description: 日本经济持续疲软的态势周二仍备受关注，此前一天公布的国内生产总值数据远低于预期。【原文：Japan's weakening economy remained in focus on Tuesday, one day after much softer than expected GDP numbers.】

item.title: 《华尔街日报》报道称，Starboard将推动对Tripadvisor董事会进行重组
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士报道，激进投资者Starboard Value计划推动对Tripadvisor董事会进行重组。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value plans to push for a shake-up of Tripadvisor's board, The Wall Street Journal reported on Monday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为未来利率没有既定路径，此前2月加息
item.description: 悉尼2月17日（路透社）——澳大利亚央行表示，若未如本月般加息，通胀率将持续居高不下，且目前尚不确定是否需要进一步收紧货币政策。【原文：SYDNEY, Feb 17 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank concluded inflation would stay stubbornly high if it had not hiked interest rates as it did this month, and was not yet sure if further tightening would be necessary.】

item.title: 爱尔兰就马斯克旗下Grok AI涉及性化图像展开调查
item.description: 上月，Grok平台应用户要求，向X平台大量推送经人工智能修改的真人近裸体图像，引发全球范围的强烈谴责及多国调查。【原文：Grok flooded X last month with AI-altered, near-nude images of real people in response to user requests, triggering widespread global outrage and investigations.】

item.title: 凯悦集团执行董事长普利兹克辞职，称其与爱泼斯坦的关联是"判断失误"
item.description: 托马斯·普利兹克表示，现年75岁的他将不会在2026年寻求连任公司董事会席位。【原文：Thomas Pritzker, 75, will not seek re-election to the company's board in 2026, he said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚天然气生产商桑托斯公司赢得关于净零排放主张的法庭诉讼
item.description: 天然气生产商桑托斯公司在一场关于其可持续发展主张的法律诉讼中胜诉。澳大利亚法院周二驳回了指控该公司就实现净零排放计划误导公众的诉讼。【原文：Gas producer Santos has won a legal battle over its sustainability claims, with an Australian court on Tuesday dismissing a lawsuit that alleged the company misled the public on its plans to achieve net zero.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团与惠顿贵金属公司签署白银流协议
item.description: 必和必拓集团周二与惠顿贵金属旗下子公司达成一项长期白银流协议，协议完成时将支付43亿美元预付款。【原文：BHP Group on Tuesday entered a long-term silver streaming agreement with a unit of Wheaton Precious Metals for an upfront payment of $4.3 billion at completion.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团上半年利润因大宗商品价格上涨跃升22%
item.description: 必和必拓集团周二公布的半年基本利润超出预期，这得益于上半年创纪录的铁矿石产量以及其核心商品铁矿石和铜价的上涨。【原文：BHP Group on Tuesday reported a better-than-expected half-year underlying profit, driven by record first-half iron ore production and higher prices for its key commodities, iron ore and copper.】

item.title: 花旗称地缘政治因素短期支撑油价；和平协议或压低油价
item.description: 花旗周一表示，由于美国总统特朗普正加大推动涉及俄罗斯和伊朗的和平协议的压力，短期内油价可能保持坚挺，但今年晚些时候的协议最终可能导致原油价格下跌。【原文：Oil prices could remain supported in the near term as U.S. President Donald Trump ramps up pressure for peace deals involving Russia and Iran, but a resolution later this year may ultimately push crude lower, Citi said on Monday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，SpaceX将参与五角大楼的自主无人机技术竞赛
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，知情人士透露，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX及其全资子公司xAI正在参与五角大楼一项秘密新竞赛，旨在研发语音控制的自主无人机集群技术。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX and its wholly-owned subsidiary xAI are competing in a secret new Pentagon contest to produce voice-controlled, autonomous drone swarming technology, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Third Point收购西班牙防务公司Indra的股份
item.description: 知情人士周一向路透社透露，美国对冲基金Third Point已收购西班牙防务公司英德拉的部分股权，并支持该公司董事长收购较小竞争对手埃斯克里巴诺机械与工程公司的计划。【原文：U.S. hedge fund Third Point has bought a stake in Spanish defence company Indra and supports its chairman's plan to acquire smaller rival Escribano Mechanical & Engineering, a market source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 恩智浦将获国际投资公司6000万美元贷款以提升芯片产量
item.description: 荷兰国有金融机构Invest International周一发表声明称，将向芯片制造商恩智浦提供6000万美元贷款，以支持其生产基地的一系列全球投资。【原文：Dutch state-owned finance institution Invest International will provide chipmaker Nexperia with a $60 million loan to support a series of global investments in its production sites, it said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 加拿大宣布任命新任首席贸易谈判代表赴美
item.description: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼周一宣布任命公务员珍妮丝·夏雷特为下一任美国首席贸易谈判代表。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced on Monday the appointment of public servant Janice Charette as the next chief trade negotiator to the United States.】

item.title: 加密货币公司Nexo在与监管机构发生冲突三年后重返美国市场
item.description: 加密货币公司Nexo周一宣布，在离开美国三年并因与监管机构发生冲突而支付4500万美元罚款后，现已重返美国市场。【原文：Crypto company Nexo has relaunched in the United States, it said on Monday, three years after leaving the country and paying a $45 million fine following clashes with regulators.】

item.title: 厄瓜多虾类出口量在2025年实现反弹，超越石油出口——生产者协会
item.description: 厄瓜多尔水产养殖业协会负责人表示，2025年该国虾类出口额同比增长20%，达到84亿美元，创历史新高。这一增长得益于美国提高关税带来的暂时性提振，以及近年来该行业持续稳定的投资。【原文：Ecuadorean shrimp exports rose 20% year-on-year in 2025 to $8.4 billion, a record driven by a temporary boost from higher U.S. tariffs and steady sector investment in recent years, the head of the aquaculture industry association said.】

item.title: 印度新德里人工智能峰会开幕，现场排长队、混乱不堪
item.description: 旨在展示印度科技雄心的"印度人工智能影响峰会"于周一开幕首日遭遇网络舆论抨击浪潮。与会者反映，新德里会场出现排队人潮、场馆拥挤及组织疏漏等问题。【原文：India's AI Impact Summit, an event meant to showcase the country's technology ambitions, faced a wave of online criticism on its opening day on Monday as attendees reported long queues, overcrowding and organizational lapses at the New Delhi venue.】

item.title: X平台在美国和英国数千用户中出现故障，Downdetector网站显示
item.description: 据Downdetector.com网站显示，社交媒体平台X于周一在美国和英国遭遇数千用户无法访问的情况。【原文：Social media platform X was down for thousands of users in the United States and UK on Monday, according to Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 伊拉克-阿联酋联合体计划投资7亿美元建设高速数据电缆网络
item.description: 伊拉克-阿联酋联合财团计划斥资7亿美元铺设海底及陆地数据光缆，连接阿联酋与土耳其，途经伊拉克。该财团一位支持者透露，此计划宣布之际，距沙特支持的叙利亚光纤项目公布仅一周有余。【原文：An Iraqi-Emirati consortium plans a $700 million subsea-and-terrestrial data cable linking the United Arab Emirates to Turkey via Iraq, one of the backers said, just over a week after announcement of a Saudi-backed fibre-optic project in Syria.】

item.title: Anthropic首席执行官阿莫迪表示，该公司印度市场营收年化增长率在4个月内实现翻倍。
item.description: Anthropic首席执行官达里奥·阿莫代周一表示，该公司印度市场的收入运行率在四个月内翻了一番，凸显了这家人工智能初创企业的Claude编程产品在该国迅速普及的态势。【原文：Anthropic's revenue run-rate in India has doubled in four months, chief executive officer Dario Amodei said on Monday, underscoring the rapid adoption of the AI startup's Claude coding product in the country.】

item.title: 德国社民党报纸加入呼吁限制儿童使用社交媒体的行列
item.description: 德国中左翼社会民主党的一批议员已与保守派联盟伙伴共同呼吁限制儿童使用社交媒体，提议对14岁以下人群实施正式禁令。【原文：A group of German centre-left Social Democrats has joined their conservative coalition partners in calling for restrictions on social media access for children, proposing a formal ban for those under 14.】

item.title: 科技巨头股价暴跌，人工智能支出担忧冲击估值
item.description: 全球最具价值的技术股今年市值大幅缩水，此前这些股票已连续多年大幅上涨。投资者质疑，在人工智能领域的大规模投入能否带来足够回报，以支撑其高昂估值。【原文：The world's most valuable technology stocks have suffered sharp declines in market value this year after years of outsized gains, as investors question whether heavy spending on AI will generate sufficient returns to justify the lofty valuations.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出全新Qwen3.5模型，开启"能动AI时代"
item.description: 阿里巴巴周一发布了全新人工智能模型Qwen 3.5，该模型旨在独立执行复杂任务，在性能和成本方面均有显著提升。这家中国科技巨头宣称，该模型在多项基准测试中超越了美国主要竞争对手的模型。【原文：Alibaba on Monday unveiled a new artificial intelligence model Qwen 3.5 designed to execute complex tasks independently, with big improvements in performance and cost that the Chinese tech giant claims beat major U.S. rival models on several benchmarks.】

item.title: 从OpenAI到谷歌，印度举办全球人工智能峰会
item.description: 全球人工智能巨头的高管们本周将与多位世界领导人齐聚新德里，参加一场重要的人工智能峰会。此时印度正致力于吸引更多该行业的投资。【原文：Top executives from global AI giants will join several world leaders in New Delhi this week for a major artificial intelligence summit, at a time when India is trying to lure more investment in the industry.】

item.title: 中国人形机器人准备好迎接春节演出
item.description: 中国收视率最高的电视节目——中央电视台年度春节联欢晚会将于周一晚间播出，此次晚会将成为展示中国尖端产业政策的重要窗口，彰显北京在人形机器人领域的主导地位及对制造业未来的引领。【原文：China's most-watched TV show, the annual CCTV Spring Festival gala, will be viewed later on Monday as a showcase for the country's cutting-edge industrial policy and Beijing's push to dominate humanoid robots and the future of manufacturing.】

item.title: 据《经理人杂志》报道，大众汽车计划到2028年底将成本削减20%。
item.description: 据《经理人杂志》周一报道，大众汽车计划在2028年底前实现旗下所有品牌成本削减20%。【原文：Volkswagen plans to cut costs by 20% across all brands by the end of 2028, Manager Magazin reported on Monday.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：日本经济亟需火马之势提振
item.description: 韦恩·科尔为您解析欧洲及全球市场今日展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 欧洲企业盈利增速加快，但高估值限制了回报空间
item.description: 欧洲企业本财报季的盈利增长正逐步回升，经济前景也出现初步改善迹象。但谨慎的投资者要求企业不仅要交出亮眼业绩，更需证明当前高企的估值具有合理依据。【原文：European company earnings growth is picking up this reporting season against a tentatively improving economic backdrop, but wary investors are demanding more than solid results to justify sky-high valuations.】

item.title: Disney sends cease-and-desist to ByteDance over AI-generated videos
item.description: Disney has sent a cease-and-desist letter to ByteDance accusing the Chinese company of using Disney characters to train and power its Seedance 2.0 AI video generator without permission, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.

item.title: 日本首相高市早苗将与日本央行行长植田和男举行胜选后首次会晤
item.description: 日本央行行长植田和男与首相高市早苗将于周一举行执政党大选压倒性胜利后的首次双边会晤，此次会晤或将成为讨论央行加息计划的场合。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda and Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi will hold their first bilateral meeting on Monday since the ruling party's landslide election victory, which could serve as a venue to discuss the central bank's rate-hike plans.】
